name: Each Glimpse A Mirror
description:
It was hard to say how long you spent entangled with them - this spectre that entered your life unannounced. 

Your sense of time became warped. One thing stretched into another, until you could not see the joins at all. 

A short narrative game about the paths not taken.

From the writer of Electric Sleep:

(“Like many of the best interactive fiction games, Electric Sleep does a lot with a little.” RockPaperShotgun

“A fantastic text-based adventure… superb writing… Electric Sleep is a must play.” GameGrin

“A captivating interactive adventure.” GameSpew)
